visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a bar chart with the following specifications: The chart type should be 'bar'. The chart title should be 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes: the title font size should be 18px, the axis labels font size should be 14px, and the axis title color should be '#333333'. The data series should include one series named 'Rainfall' with the data provided in the JavaScript code. Custom colors for the bars should be '#008000' (green). Additional configurations should include setting the chart margins to 50px, a white background for the chart, and a legend with a vertical layout, floating, white background, aligned to the right, and positioned at the top with an offset.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a bar chart with specific settings. The chart type is set to 'bar', and it includes a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall' with a font size of 18px. The x-axis and y-axis are labeled with 'Months' and 'Rainfall (mm)' respectively, both styled with a font size of 14px and a title color of '#333333'. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with the given monthly rainfall data, and the bars are colored green ('#008000'). The chart has custom margins set to 50px on all sides and a white background. The legend is configured to be vertical, floating, with a white background, aligned to the right, and positioned at the top with an offset. The tooltip displays the series name and the specific data point when hovered over.
